We have an excellent opportunity for the role of IP Network Security, based out of Navi Mumbai Location. Interested applicants can apply to below job description -

Primary Skill: Web Application Security Testing, Network Pen testing, Vulnerability Management, Static code Analysis and Risk Assessment.

Security Testing Tools

Static Code Analysis: HP Fortify, Checkmarks.

Proxy Tools (Manual Testing): OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite.

Vulnerability Assessment: Qualys Web Application Scanner (WAS), Nessus (Tenable), Acunetix, Rapid7 (Appsec & InsightVM), IBM App Scan.

Penetration Testing: Metasploit, Nmap, Hydra, John ripper, Nikto, Legion, Kali Linux OS with other multiple tools.

Certification

CEH,Cloud/container secutrity certification,ITIL,CND,CCNA

Work Experience

Good knowledge of the security frameworks OWASP Top 10.

Hands on good experience on tools such as Nessus(tenable), Rapid7(Nexpose), Qualys Web Scanner (WAS), Burp Suite, NMAP, Check Marx, HP Fortify and OWASP Lapse+.

Experienced in Network Pen-testing with multiple tools along with Kali Linux & Metasploit.

Knowledge of cloud delivery, security and deployment models for Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS) offerings.

Working experience of Secure Code Review, Thread Modelling, Application Security Testing (SAST & DAST), Vulnerability Management & Risk Management.

Hands on experience on Kali Linux OS and Metasploit framework and security auditing such asISO27001, 9001 and familiar with LAWS.

Consistently research within the security area for threats, common vulnerabilities based on the OWASP Top 10, and new attack models.

Having good Knowledge in SIEM and Threat hunting, forensics and DLP (Windows 365).

There are few other tools on which I am having good experience such as Trend Micro, Minerva, Cisco AMP, Dark Trace, Forti Client Manager, Security Score Board, Panorays, Bit Sight.

Knowledge of OSI Model and Networking skills such as firewall and routers.

Provide revisions to strategies and execute plans based on business initiatives.

Proficiency in time management, communications, decision making, presentation and organizational skills.
